title: When does season 7 end?
body: I know that the season ends on the 7th but at what time? I really need to know since Iâ€™m almost into silver 5

replies.body: The season ends at November 7th at 23:59 Pacific Time, but we've also got a handy little countdown over here on the [**Ranked Rewards Help Desk**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk?sort_type=recent)! That timer should be tuned to your local time I believe, so it'll be like New Years watching the 2017 End of Season ball drop xD!!!
BroPoro, if its local time is it na time or like very precise time zones?
